title: Bread and butter pudding with a marmalade glaze and cinnamon and orange butter
ingredients: ['100g unsalted butter, softened', 'large pinch ground nutmeg', 'large pinch ground cinnamon', '1 large orange, zest only', '8 (1cm) slices good-quality bread', '9 large free-range eggs', '140g caster sugar', '500ml whole milk', '1 vanilla pod, scored lengthways and seeds removed', '4 tablespoons good-quality fine-cut marmalade']
